description: [Saint Bear](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1031) has impersonated government and related entities in both phishing activity and developing web sites with malicious links that mimic legitimate resources.(Citation: Cadet Blizzard emerges as novel threat actor)

external_references.description: Microsoft Threat Intelligence. (2023, June 14). Cadet Blizzard emerges as a novel and distinct Russian threat actor. Retrieved July 10, 2023.
external_references.source_name: Cadet Blizzard emerges as novel threat actor
